name: Lassen Volcanic National Park
description: Lassen Volcanic National Park is home to steaming fumaroles, meadows freckled with wildflowers, clear mountain lakes, and numerous volcanoes. Jagged peaks tell the story of its eruptive past while hot water continues to shape the land.
shortDescription: Lassen Volcanic National Park is home to steaming fumaroles, meadows freckled with wildflowers, clear mountain lakes, and numerous volcanoes. Jagged peaks tell the story of its eruptive past while hot...

operatingHours.description: The park is always open. Road access is limited during the winter season, approximately November through May, due to snow.

fees.title: Entrance - Private Vehicle
fees.description: Admits one private, non-commercial vehicle. Valid for up to 7 consecutive days from day of purchase at Lassen Volcanic National Park. When entrance station is not staffed, digital passes may be purchased online at recreation.gov.

fees.title: Entrance - Private Vehicle
fees.description: Discounted entry fee during winter. Admits one private, non-commercial vehicle. Valid for up to 7 consecutive days from day of purchase at Lassen Volcanic National Park. When entrance station is not staffed, digital passes may be purchased online at recreation.gov.

fees.title: Entrance - Motorcycle
fees.description: Valid for 7 days. Admits up to 2 private, non-commercial motorcycles with up to 4 total passengers. When entrance station is not staffed, digital passes may be purchased online at recreation.gov.

fees.title: Entrance - Per Person
fees.description: Per-person entrance fee used to admit one person on foot or bicycle. Also used for individuals traveling together in a vehicle as a non-commercial, organized group. Valid for up to 7 consecutive days from day of purchase at Lassen Volcanic National Park. When entrance station is not staffed, digital passes may be purchased online at recreation.gov.

fees.title: Entrance - Education/Academic Groups
fees.description: Park entrance fees are waived for eligible academic groups with approved fee waiver application. Applications must be submitted at least two weeks prior to park visit.

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Sedan
fees.description: Valid for up to 7 consecutive days for a vehicle carrying the same group of passengers. A commercial tour is defined as consisting of one or more persons traveling on an itinerary that has been packaged, priced, or sold for leisure or recreational purposes by an organization that realizes financial gain through the provision of the service. The entry fees are based upon the total seating capacity of vehicles regardless of the actual number of passengers. Annual or lifetime passes are not accepted.

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Van
fees.description: Valid for up to 7 consecutive days for a vehicle carrying the same group of passengers. A commercial tour is defined as consisting of one or more persons traveling on an itinerary that has been packaged, priced, or sold for leisure or recreational purposes by an organization that realizes financial gain through the provision of the service. The entry fees are based upon the total seating capacity of vehicles regardless of the actual number of passengers. Annual or lifetime passes are not accepted.

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Mini-bus
fees.description: Valid for up to 7 consecutive days for a vehicle carrying the same group of passengers. A commercial tour is defined as consisting of one or more persons traveling on an itinerary that has been packaged, priced, or sold for leisure or recreational purposes by an organization that realizes financial gain through the provision of the service. The entry fees are based upon the total seating capacity of vehicles regardless of the actual number of passengers. Annual or lifetime passes are not accepted.

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Motor Coach
fees.description: Valid for up to 7 consecutive days for a vehicle carrying the same group of passengers. A commercial tour is defined as consisting of one or more persons traveling on an itinerary that has been packaged, priced, or sold for leisure or recreational purposes by an organization that realizes financial gain through the provision of the service. The entry fees are based upon the total seating capacity of vehicles regardless of the actual number of passengers. Annual or lifetime passes are not accepted.

fees.title: Entrance - Motorcycle
fees.description: Discounted entry fee for winter. Admits one private, non-commercial motorcycle and its riders. Valid for up to 7 consecutive days from day of purchase at Lassen Volcanic National Park. When entrance station is not staffed, digital passes may be purchased online at recreation.gov.

fees.title: Entrance - Per Person
fees.description: Discounted entry fee for winter. Per-person entrance fee used to admit one person on foot or bicycle. Also used for individuals traveling together in a vehicle as a non-commercial, organized group. Valid for up to 7 consecutive days from day of purchase at Lassen Volcanic National Park. When entrance station is not staffed, digital passes may be purchased online at recreation.gov.

climate.weatherDescription: Weather at Lassen can vary dramatically throughout the year. Average January temperatures are a high of 40.4 °F (4.7 °C) and a low of 20.8 °F (-6.2 °C). Average July temperatures are a high of 88.4 °F and a low of 49.8 °F. Temperatures reach 90 °F or higher on an average of 36.9 days, and drop to 32 ° or lower on an average of 164 days days annually.

images.title: Winter at Manzanita Lake
images.altText: A frozen lake below snow-covered trees and peak
images.caption: With over 30 feet of snowfall annually, Lassen provides numerous opportunities for winter recreation.

images.title: Hat Creek
images.altText: Golden grasses edge a pond reflecting a snow-dusted peak
images.caption: Lassen Volcanic's rugged volcanic landscape is softened by numerous meadows, lakes, and creeks.

images.title: Bumpass Hell
images.altText: A boardwalk passes through a colorful, steaming hydrothermal basin.
images.caption: A 3-mile round-trip trail leads to Bumpass Hell, the largest of the park's hydrothermal areas.

images.title: Brokeoff Panorama
images.altText: Two hikers sit on a mountain top with a view of multiple peaks, dotted with patches of snow
images.caption: Over 150 miles of trails let you choose your adventure.

images.title: Deep Blue
images.altText: A volcanic peak rises above a tree-lined, deep blue lake.
images.caption: Lassen Peak stands out boldly between the bright blue sky and the sapphire hue of Lake Helen.

images.title: A Fisherman's Paradise
images.altText: A fisherman casts a line from a boat below a snow-dotted volcanic peak.
images.caption: Manzanita Lake offers spectacular catch-and-release fishing in the shadow of volcanoes.

images.title: Lassen Peak Eruption
images.altText: An ash cloud rises above a volcano with an early 19th century vehicle at the forefront.
images.caption: A large, explosive eruption of Lassen Peak brought national attention and set the stage for the establishment of Lassen Peak.
